subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the second straight game, Pedro Ciriaco delivered a late hit to propel the Red Sox over the Yankees, this time with a bloop single in the 10th inning against reliever Dave Robertson.
snippet: For the second straight game, Pedro Ciriaco delivered a late hit to propel the Red Sox over the Yankees, this time with a bloop single in the 10th inning against reliever Dave Robertson.
